Room.Name: Glacier Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: You are looking over the cliff leading into the Dennanl Abyss, far below.
Room.LongDescription: The glacier pass comes to an end at the cliffs overlooking the Abyss to the north and continues through the glacier to the west. A cold breeze comes up from the Abyss almost on a regular basis. Looking down into the Abyss, you can see nothing. The Abyss appears to continue forever in all directions. You must fly to go north.
